
                            
                            <p>今天庐山爆满房价飞起，和我条件差不多的基本上都涨到七八百。你们猜下面两间哪个卖的贵？ <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/22/165148tvrk13afv5rd1b35.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/22/165148tvrk13afv5rd1b35.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/22/165149aetj4lieba7i1g1n.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/22/165149aetj4lieba7i1g1n.jpg"> <br>  <br> 刚把自己睡的阁楼整理出来卖了300，也有独卫空调哈。前面一间带阳台的两张1.5米床很早别人订的才260<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1036.gif" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1036.gif">  <br> 如果那个2张1.5米的现在卖，估计700块好卖 <br>  <br> 房间基本上都是200左右卖完的，没有发财命啊。我还告诉客人怕周末限流，叫他们赶紧提前把门票预约了，一个个打电话通知。别人不通知，然后客人上不来退房，反而能卖个高价 </p>
                            <p>
                                
                            </p>
